snippet: China said Tuesday that it had sent its top envoy to North Korea this week to push for the resumption of talks on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
abstract: China says that it has sent its top envoy to North Korea to push for the resumption of talks on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.
lead_paragraph: China said Tuesday that it had sent its top envoy to North Korea this week to push for the resumption of talks on denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.

headline.main: China: Envoy Sent to North Korea to Push for Talks
headline.print_headline: China: Envoy Sent to North Korea to Push for Talks
